recently_narrative:
1. The most significant operational pattern observed across these article titles is the recurring service incidents and stability issues affecting Zendesk's core products, particularly Workforce Management (WFM) and the Resolution Platform, which appear to be coinciding with the rollout of new AI-powered features and capabilities.

2. This suggests that Zendesk administrators need to closely monitor the impact of these AI-driven enhancements on the overall platform stability and performance, and ensure thorough testing and gradual rollout of new features to mitigate the risk of disruptions to critical customer support operations.

release_notes.summary: Copilot ticket summarization now includes both public replies and internal notes, with an expanded word limit to capture more ticket context. Copilot's real-time AI suggestions for agents during live voice calls provide instant, context-aware recommendations from the help center to help resolve customer issues more efficiently.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-10-10
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
Voice
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
